member.name: RM_REBOOT_REASON
member.summary: Describes the reasons a restart of the system is needed.

member.name: RM_REBOOT_REASON.RmRebootReasonNone
member.summary: A system restart is not required.

member.name: RM_REBOOT_REASON.RmRebootReasonPermissionDenied
member.summary: The current user does not have sufficient privileges to shut down one or more processes.

member.name: RM_REBOOT_REASON.RmRebootReasonSessionMismatch
member.summary: One or more processes are running in another Terminal Services session.

member.name: RM_REBOOT_REASON.RmRebootReasonCriticalProcess
member.summary: A system restart is needed because one or more processes to be shut down are critical processes.

member.name: RM_REBOOT_REASON.RmRebootReasonCriticalService
member.summary: A system restart is needed because one or more services to be shut down are critical services.

member.name: RM_REBOOT_REASON.RmRebootReasonDetectedSelf
member.summary: A system restart is needed because the current process must be shut down.
